author: pauld.9606
content: <@!227960531053576202> A late response. This channel is called "code-merklization", but one should also be aware of bytecode compression https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/91 . There are experiments which get a 3x-4x compression ratio.

author: _drinkcoffee
content: <@!682078300234973185>  thank you for pointing that out. Very interesting. I will add the compression as an additional step to try in the research I am doing on Happy Path Code Merklization.

author: pipermerriam
content: Gentle reminder that compression is only effective in non adversarial situations. And thus we hand to assume things are uncompressable for security considerations
